about_the_game:
Dive into the Shadows of a Dystopian Future

In a world where humans and their shadows have been separated, the line between reality and despair is thin. Explore a dark and disturbing universe as Theo, a young man trapped in a cycle of apathy, discovers a new dimension of his own existence.

Living Shadows is a narrative-driven adventure with puzzles, where themes like anxiety, depression, and existential crises are intertwined in a captivating plot. Travel through a desolate city, mysterious areas, and solve puzzles as Theo confronts his shadow and the dark secrets of his family.

Game Features:

  • Explore sensitive themes such as mental health, anxiety, and the impact of technology on human life.

  • Solve puzzles and unravel mysteries as Theo explores his world, divided between light and shadow.

  • Interact with Theo's shadow, a symbol of his repressed fears and traumas, to progress through the story.

  • Travel through dark and desolate environments that reflect the emotional state of the characters.

  • Meet Theo, the mysterious Bituca, and other memorable characters who embody the internal and emotional struggles of a broken society.

  • Dark and detailed 2.5D graphics that capture the essence of a dystopian and emotionally charged future.

An Emotional Journey in a Dark World

Each environment in Living Shadows reflects the internal chaos of its characters, creating an atmosphere that immerses the player in psychological and existential themes. The game combines narrative and puzzles, offering a provocative experience.

If you're looking for an adventure that explores the limits of the human mind, Living Shadows is the perfect challenge, pushing you to confront the unknown and uncover hidden truths.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains sensitive themes such as depression, anxiety, burnout, ADHD, racism, abuse, among others, presented in a playful manner.

Minimum:

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • VR Support: No
